# JFS Wears - Premium Online Fashion Store

> JFS Wears is a premium online fashion retailer specializing in luxury Nigerian and African contemporary clothing, including Kaftans, Agbada, and modern streetwear.

## Core Documentation
- [Shop Index](https://jfs-wears.com/shop) - Comprehensive catalog of all available products.
- [Fashion Blog](https://jfs-wears.com/blog) - Editorial content on trends and style guides.
- [About Us](https://jfs-wears.com/about) - Brand history and mission.

## Product Collections
- [Men's Collection](https://jfs-wears.com/collections/men)
- [Women's Collection](https://jfs-wears.com/collections/women)
- [New Arrivals](https://jfs-wears.com/collections/new)

## Technical Summary
- **Sitemap**: https://jfs-wears.com/sitemap.xml
- **Full Context**: https://jfs-wears.com/llms-full.txt
